splittermond.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please file a bug report.

chatCard.noGMConnected: Action cannot be performed, because no authorized user (GM) is connected
chatCard.messageNotFound: Message to update not found in the chat log
chatCard.actionNotFound: The selected action could not be executed, because the recipient does not know it. Please file a bug report.

spellMessage.noHandler: No handler registered for action '{action}'. Please contact the developer.
spellMessage.tooManyHandlers: More than one handler registered for action '{action}'. Please contact the developer

damageMessage.noActorFound: Found no actor to route damage to
damageMessage.noTargetsFound: Could not find targets for Damage

parseMessages.notAModifier: Modifier '{modifier}' is not of a modifier format.
parseMessages.duplicateValue: Modifier '{modifier}' contains duplicate declaration of value
parseMessages.noValue: Modifier '{modifier}' contains no declaration of value
parseMessages.duplicateAttribute: Attribute '{attribute}' exists several times in modifier.
parseMessages.noAttributeKey: Could not identify key for Attribute '{attribute}'.
parseMessages.noAttributeValue: Could not identify value for Attribute '{attribute}'.
parseMessages.keyHasExpressionFormat: Key should not have expression format
parseMessages.shouldNotBeNumber: Input '{input}' is should not be a number.
parseMessages.shouldNotBeAnExpression: Input '{input}' should not be an expression.
parseMessages.referenceNotPrimitive: '{propertyPath}' does not resolve to a primitve on '{objectName}'.
parseMessages.allErrorMessage: Syntax error in modifier string '{str}' in '{objectName}'!
parseMessages.foNoCost: Expression '{expression}' is not convertible to focus costs.
parseMessages.notANumber: Expression '{expression}' is not convertible to a number.
parseMessages.deprecatedPath: The path '{oldPath}' in {itemName} is deprecated. Use '{newPath}' instead.
parseMessages.missingDescriptor: The attribute '{attribute}' for the modifier '{groupId}' is missing.
parseMessages.invalidDescriptorValue: The value '{value}' for the attribute '{attribute}' for the modifier '{groupId}' is invalid.
parseMessages.unknownDescriptor: The attribute '{attribute}' for the modifier '{groupId}' ist unknown.

message.mangledTableData: table data is corrupted. Please check attributes and derived values.
message.featureParsingFailure: Feature '{feature}' did not resolve to a valid feature descriptor
message.invalidStatusEffectInterval: The value for the interval on item '{name}' is invalid

reducibleEnhancementCosts.name: Reducable Spell Enhancement Costs
reducibleEnhancementCosts.hint: Permits the reduction of enhancement costs by using degrees of success

HGMultiplier.name: Hero level multiplier
HGMultiplier.hint: Multiplier for calculating skill points and attribute modifiers.

displayDamageDialog.name: Show damage dialog
displayDamageDialog.hint: Displays a dialog to review the damage applied to target

stableProtectsAllReduction.name: Feature 'stable' nullifies all 'Piercing' features
stableProtectsAllReduction.hint: If an armor with feature 'stable' is attacked by a piercing weapon, then the effect of 'piercing' on the entire damage reduction is negated. If this option is deactivated, this effect only applies to the damage reduction provided by the armor with the feature.

paste.name: Paste Item
paste.hint: Permits importing items from the clipboard into the game

itemImport.selectAFolder: Select a folder to import the item into

spellValidation.spellsExcluded: Upon import, some spells were omitted. See console for details.
spellValidation.invalidSkillLevel: Spell '{spellName}' has no valid spell level.
spellValidation.invalidFocusCosts: Spell '{spellName}' has no valid focus costs.
spellValidation.invalidDamage: Spell '{spellName}' has no valid damage value.

addTickDialogue.title: Add Ticks
addTickDialogue.noNegativeNumbers: A duration many not be negative.
